subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Chris Bosh had 38 points and 14 rebounds, and the Toronto Raptors beat visiting Portland, 116-109 in double overtime, Sunday to hand the Trail Blazers their second loss in 19 games.
snippet: Chris Bosh had 38 points and 14 rebounds, and the Toronto Raptors beat visiting Portland, 116-109 in double overtime, Sunday to hand the Trail Blazers their second loss in 19 games.
